    A

    A - Variable in class heparansulfate.LinEqCons
    matrix in Ax = b
    AVSFormCons - Class in heparansulfate
    creates an affine constraint in standard form (Ax = b, with rank(A) < dim(b) and b >= 0)and with artificial variables (for phase I of the simplex)
    AVSFormCons(double[][], double[]) - Constructor for class heparansulfate.AVSFormCons
    creates an affine constraint in standard canonical form (with added artificial variables) for phase I of the simplex: [I A] x = b, with b >= 0

    cholesky(double[][]) - Static method in class heparansulfate.MatrixOp
    Performs the Cholesky factorization of a symmetric and positive definite matrix A: A = LL^T, where L is lower triangular with positive diagonal elements.

    CoordDescNNQP - Class in heparansulfate
    solution to nonnegative quadratic programming: minimize (1/2)x^TQx + c^Tx subject to x >= 0 via coordinate descent.
    CoordDescNNQP(double[][], double[], double[]) - Constructor for class heparansulfate.CoordDescNNQP
    Solves: minimize (1/2)x^TQx + c^Tx subject to x >= 0.

    GradientWidth - Class in heparansulfate
    utilizes linear programming to estimate bounds of S/U proportions at each position in chains; two different constructors: one for all BKHS chains having same length and one for a mixture of chain lengths

    H

    HCModel - Class in heparansulfate
    Homogeneous Markov model of species (chain sequence) abundances (model H&C); field this.g contains the expected fragment length distribution after digestion by one heparinase

    LinEqCons - Class in heparansulfate
    Class that represents linear equality/inequality constraints: Ax = b or Ax <= b, where A is an m by n matrix and b an m vector.
    LinEqCons(double[][], double[], String[]) - Constructor for class heparansulfate.LinEqCons
    represents a linear equality constraint: Ax = b

    makeProf(String, String) - Static method in class heparansulfate.MaxEntModelW

    MaxEntOptim - Class in heparansulfate

    NIModel - Class in heparansulfate
    represents a nonhomogeneity and independence (N&I) model: different building block composition at each position in a chain and independence between positions; field this.g contains the expected heparinase fragment length distribution under model N&I
    NIModel(BBSet, CSpec, double[][], int) - Constructor for class heparansulfate.NIModel
    represents a nonhomogeneity and independence (N&I) model: different building block composition at each position in a chain and independence between positions
    NIModelLIC - Class in heparansulfate

    NIModelLIC(int, BBSet) - Constructor for class heparansulfate.NIModelLIC

    SFormCons - Class in heparansulfate
    This class represents a linear constraint Ax = b in standard form: matrix A (m x n) has rank m < n and b >= 0.
    SFormCons(double[][], double[]) - Constructor for class heparansulfate.SFormCons
    creates a linear equality constraint in standard form (Ax = b with b >= 0) starting from a m x n matrix A (of rank m) and a vector b

    SimplexPhaseI - Class in heparansulfate

    T

    Tableau - Class in heparansulfate
    simplex tableau
    Tableau(double[][]) - Constructor for class heparansulfate.Tableau
    constructor for phase II based on an array-tableau already in canonical form, at the exception of the last row (cost coefficients) which is reduced at the end of this constructor
    Tableau(AVSFormCons) - Constructor for class heparansulfate.Tableau
    constructor for phase I: creates a simplex tableau based on a constraint in canonical form (linear constraint in standard form with added artificial variables)
    Tableau(SimplexPhaseI, double[]) - Constructor for class heparansulfate.Tableau
    constructor for phase II based on the results of phase I
    testCompCons(String) - Static method in class heparansulfate.Species

    testFragCons(String) - Static method in class heparansulfate.Species
    testing of the constraints for fragment length distributions, with a N&I model; note that since N&I cannot reproduce fragment length distributions, values of constraints are calculated from the N&I model
    testHomogeneityCons(String) - Static method in class heparansulfate.Species
    testing of homogeneity constraint with model H&I
    testing(String) - Static method in class heparansulfate.Species

    testNormCons(String) - Static method in class heparansulfate.Species

    testRhoLHomFeas(String) - Static method in class heparansulfate.MixSpecies
